figcaption.p: Education Services oversees curriculum, instruction, staff development, assessment, special education and categorical programs for the 13 district schools.
Our district provides safe and efficient daily transportation for our Special Education students, plus field trip and activity services.

Berryessa Union School District aims to recruit, hire, and maintain an outstanding certificated and classified staff. Check out our employment opportunities and learn how to join the Berryessa Union team.
Our Maintenance & Operations staff strives to ensure all district stakeholders have a safe, clean and healthy learning environment they can be proud of.
Business Services oversees budgets, purchasing, payroll, accounting, nutrition, maintenance, transportation, data processing, facilities, safety and more.

div.div: Mission Statement Representing a beautiful spectrum of ethnic and cultural backgrounds, Berryessa pupils experience a well-coordinated curriculum that reflects the commitment to helping each student achieve her/his potential and interests. Support for all of our students gives each student the opportunity to be a successful learner. We also provide specialized programs in instrumental and choral music, the arts, and physical education and sports. We have a proud tradition of success for all students and encourage you to browse our site for information about programs and successes.
